sen.e: Since Emperor's maternal uncles, FUJIWARA no Michitaka, FUJIWARA no Michikane and FUJIWARA no Michinaga took political power by turns under Emperor Ichijo's supervision and regulated Kokyu which is special part of Imperial palace Empresses and Princesses live, Emperor SANJO was thirty six years old when he finally enthroned by taking over Emperor ICHIJO, he was Crown Prince for twenty five years.

sen.e: Due to this, it was the end of sharing the Imperial Throne between Emperor REIZEI and Emperor Enyu, the Throne was kept within Emperor Enyu's direct descendant for a long time, Emperor SANJO's blood line was taken over to the next generation of the Imperial family through Princess Teishi.
